name: Ben Cao
headerTaglineFour: with excellent UI and delightful user experience.

projects.title: Taskly
projects.description: Taskly is a task management system for small businesses. Taskly is the ultimate productivity tool. Create custom tasks, assign them to your clients, track the status of outstanding tasks, send reminders, and manage client responses all on a single platform.

projects.title: Podcast Library
projects.description: A full-stack app that gives the user freedom to browse, search, subscribe and play his/her favorite podcasts. The user will be able to create an account and have his/her own customizable podcast library and playlist.

projects.title: ChachaChat
projects.description: A chat AI app that is powered by OpenAI API with many features.

projects.title: Smart To-do List
projects.description: A todo-list that auto-categorizes the tasks when the users add in their items and provide task details and suggestions under the category from API.

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: Full-stack web developer with experience in electrical design and automotive manufacturing. I found my passion for programming through part-time learning and decide to focus on pursuing a new career in web development. I am eager to bring my project management, communication, and research skills in delivering excellent work. I enjoy creating products that have a clean UX/UI that is easy to use and navigate through.

resume.description: I found my passion for programming through part-time learning and decide to focus on pursuing a new career in web development. I am eager to bring my project management, communication, and research skills in delivering excellent work. I enjoy creating products that have a clean UX/UI that is easy to use and navigate through.

experiences.bullets: Design develop and test the PLC and HMI programs on production machines, Manage various investment projects and business plans on installing new equipment such as robots and improvements on existing machines, Provide support on electrical hardware troubleshooting on a daily basis, Help other members in the department on different projects by providing technical advice as an electrical expert

Design test and validate new electrical features and functions for trucks and loaders, Design electrical systems and programs (Harness & Schematic & Embedded Software Design) for underground mining Loaders and Trucks and Jumbo drills, Provide design solutions for new product developments

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Applied Science, Electrical Engineering
